name: Sylvetica
comment:
>>38206074

“These things are dangerous, right?” You ask. “Anyone have bird food?”

“I think it's just random, whether they follow you or not. If you wanted to capture one, you'd have to make an Artifact for it.” Aelriss says. Eunoia hops off her shoulder, fluttering over to join the other bird on the plant. The two stand on separate leaves, looking at one another inquisitively. “Aww, look at 'em.”

“I'm gonna check out that body, then...” You shrug.

> [[ Inventory – Kazamari, brawler ]]
wooden buckler (unidentified)
wooden buckler (unidentified)
lesser healing potion
moonroot herb
fluorescent torch
lamellar leggings (damaged)
tabard “Let's Get Weird – Guild Leader”
Unique Identifier: Kazamari (broken)

“Mm... anything good?” Aelriss says, sounding a bit morose. “What kind of weapon?”

“Uh, looks like he was using two shields.” You shrug.

“Glad it worked out for him.” She responds.

What will you do?
> Light a torch and look over.
> Throw something down. (Write-in)
> See if you can climb down using exploring gear.
> Other.
